text: Can someone please point me to documentation that controls how records are associated with custom objects? I'm trying to figure out how to associate records so that when a custom object is associated with a contact, the properties of that custom object are unique to that contact.
this looks like the best resource so far: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/One-to-many-custom-object-associations/idi-p/372856>

```This was actually removed from the documentation as the cardinality for custom objects will work using the API, but it breaks the UI.  Unsure on the timing of that fix, but when it is fixed, it will be brought back to the docs.```
that's a message from 2020. Is it back in the docs yet?
